DOC.brief_title: Low-Intensity Extracorporeal Shock Wave Treatment Erectile Dysfunction : A Randomized , Controlled , Double Blind Trial
DOC.criteria: Age 1870 year A history erectile dysfunction > 6 month IIEFED score < 25 In stable heterosexual relationship least 6 month Willingness attempt sexual intercourse least twice per week study followup Psychogenic ED assess standardize interview ( attachment 2 ) Known psychiatric illness Neurological disease ( include Parkinson 's disease , Multiple sclerosis , spinal cord injury , history stroke ) Traumatic nerve injury Previous pelvic surgery radiation Heart disease form unstable angina , NYHA class > II heart failure , uncontrolled arrhythmia , significantly symptomatic and/or severe valvular disease Endocrine disease include hypogonadism ( total testosterone < 12 nmol/l ) Insulin dependent uncontrolled diabetes mellitus Dependence erectogenic aid PDE5Inhibitors Use medication show interfere erection Use anticoagulant medication low dose aspirin Active cancer A diagnose Peyronie 's disease and/or prior occurrence priapism Alcohol abuse ( 21 container alcohol per week )
